word: H2859 - חָתַן - châthan - khaw-than' - Join in affinity - உறவில் சேர்

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Join in affinity / உறவில் சேர்
to become a son - in - law, to make oneself a daughter's husband
a) (Qal) a wife's father, a wife's mother, a father - in - law, a mother - in - law (participle)
b) (Hithpael) to make oneself a daughter's husband

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to give (a daughter) away in marriage; hence (generally) to contract affinity by marriage: - join in affinity, father in law, make marriages, mother in law, son in law.
Cognate: H2859, H2860, H2861
